question.title: Payara 7.2025.1 + payara-micro-managed + Arquillian + JUnit 5 - tests always pass outside container
question.body:
I’m using Payara 7.2025.1 with payara-micro-managed, Arquillian, and JUnit 5. When I run my tests, a Payara Micro instance starts and deploys correctly, but it seems that the tests themselves are executed outside the container. As a result, they always return success, regardless of the actual application behavior.

I’ve tried searching for any official sources or guides on configuring this exact combination, but I couldn’t find anything.

My questions:

Is it even possible to configure Arquillian + JUnit 5 + Payara Micro Managed in a way that ensures tests run inside the Payara Micro container?

If yes, are there any known examples, guides, or best practices?

Any pointers would be highly appreciated!

question_comments.body: It would help to show your configuration (pom.xml), JDK version, Maven version, an Arquillian test otherwise it's hard to even guess what the problem. might be...
